title: Scenario: Virtual Checkin when location services are disabled on the device
custom_preconds:
Prerequisite: Please test in Android 2.2, 2.3, and 4.0

Given we have disabled the location services on the device
And we have selected a Stadium
custom_steps: When we tap on the Checkin button
custom_expected: Then we are able to perform the Checkin process successfully

title: Scenario: Virtual Checkin is stored on the server as type virtual
custom_preconds:
Prerequisite: Please test in Android 2.2, 2.3, and 4.0

Given we aren't near a Stadium
And we aren't near an MLB Sponsored Location
And we have selected a Stadium

NOTE: Please check with Mobile-QA to find out how to check if a Checkin has posted to the server correctly
custom_steps: When the user taps the Checkin button
custom_expected:
Then the user is able to Checkin successfully
And the Checkin stores on the server as type virtual

title: Scenario: Virtual Checkin with no Foursquare Location selected and Foursquare switch enabled
custom_preconds:
Prerequisite: Please test in Android 2.2, 2.3, and 4.0

Given the user has navigated to a Ballpark Summary where Check In is enabled
custom_steps:
When the user attempts to Checkin
And the user has enabled the Foursquare switch
custom_expected: Then the user will not be able to Checkin successfully

title: Scenario: Virtual Checkin with Facebook switch enabled - Facebook Post
custom_preconds:
Prerequisite: Please test in Android 2.2, 2.3, and 4.0

Given we aren't near a Stadium
And we aren't near an MLB Sponsored Location
And we have selected a Stadium
custom_steps:
When the user attempts to Checkin
And the user has enabled the Facebook switch
custom_expected:
Then the user is able to Checkin successfully
And the user is able to see the Checkin on Facebook in the format of (name) checked in on Mlb.com Team vs. Team.  You can watch and listen LIVE with MLB.com

title: Scenario: Verify that a user can perform a Virtual Checkin to the same game multiple times

Given we aren't near a Stadium
And we aren't near an MLB Sponsored Location
And we have selected a Stadium
custom_steps:
When the user taps the Checkin button
And the user completes the Checkin process successfully
And the user taps the Checkin button again
custom_expected: Then the user is able to Checkin multiple times to the same game

And we aren't near an MLB Sponsored Location
And we have selected a Stadium
And there are Offers available at this Stadium
And these Offers haven't been unlocked yet

custom_expected:
Then the user is able to Checkin successfully
And the Offers for the game / stadium in question aren't unlocked

Given we aren't near a Stadium

And the user has enabled the Twitter switch
custom_expected:
Then the user is able to Checkin successfully
And the Checkin posts to Twitter as Watching the #team vs #team game w/ MLB.com  http://m.mlb.com/apps

title: Scenario: If we aren't near a Stadium or an MLB Sponsored Location - Tapping on Foursquare Location field brings up list of Foursquare locations
custom_preconds:
Prerequisite: Please test in Android 2.2, 2.3, and 4.0

Given we aren't near a Stadium
And we aren't near an MLB Sponsored Location
And we have selected a Stadium
custom_steps:
When the user taps the Checkin button
And then the user taps the Foursquare Location field
custom_expected: Then a list of Foursquare Locations are displayed

title: Scenario: Selecting Foursquare Location brings us back to main Checkin screen with that location set in the Foursquare Location field
custom_preconds:
Prerequisite: Please test in Android 2.2, 2.3, and 4.0

Given we aren't near a Stadium
And we aren't near an MLB Sponsored Location
And we have selected a Stadium
custom_steps:
When the user taps the Checkin button
And the user taps on the Foursquare Location field
And the user taps on a location from the Foursquare Location list
custom_expected: Then we are brought to the main Checkin screen again

title: Scenario: If Foursquare Location is selected user is able to click on that Foursquare Location to open up the Foursquare Location list again
custom_preconds:
Prerequisite: Please test in Android 2.2, 2.3, and 4.0

Given we aren't near a Stadium
And we aren't near an MLB Sponsored Location
And we have selected a Stadium
custom_steps:
When the user taps the Checkin button
And the user taps on the Foursquare Location field
And the user taps on a location form the Foursquare Location list
And the user taps on the Foursquare Location field that now has a Location filled into it
custom_expected: Then the Foursquare Location list will be visible

title: Scenario: If the user clicks the Refresh button inside the Foursquare Location list that it refreshes the list properly if the user has moved to new location
custom_preconds:
Prerequisite: Please test in Android 2.2, 2.3, and 4.0

Given we aren't near a Stadium
And we aren't near an MLB Sponsored Location
And we have selected a Stadium
custom_steps:
When the user taps the Checkin button
And the user taps the Foursquare Location field
And the user changes Locations
And the user taps the Find Me button
custom_expected: Then the Foursquare Location list will update to display the new list of locations that are near the user

title: Scenario: Check In with Foursquare Location selected - Stores on the server as a type of foursquare
custom_preconds:
Prerequisite: Please test in Android 2.2, 2.3, and 4.0

Given we aren't near a Stadium
And we aren't near an MLB Sponsored Location
And we have selected a Stadium

NOTE:  Please check with Mobile-QA on how to check if a Checkin has properly stored on the server
custom_steps:
When the user taps the Checkin button
And the user taps the Foursquare Location field
And the user taps a Foursquare Location
And the user continues the Checkin process
custom_expected:
Then the Checkin will be successful
And the Checkin will properly stored on the server as type foursquare

title: Scenario: Foursquare Checkin to the same game multiple times
custom_preconds:
Prerequisite: Please test in Android 2.2, 2.3, and 4.0

And we aren't near an MLB Sponsored Location
And we have selected a Stadium
custom_steps:

And the user taps a Foursquare Location

And the user taps the Foursquare Location field

And the user completes the Checkin flow

title: Scenario: Verify that the user is able to Checkin to an AdHoc Event with a Foursquare location when the Twitter, Facebook and Foursquare switches are enabled and that it posts correctly to each service

And the user has selected a Foursquare Location
And the user has enabled the Twitter switch
And the user has enabled the Facebook switch
And the user has enabled the Foursquare switch

And the AdHoc event posts correctly to Twitter

And the AdHoc event posts correctly to Foursquare

title: Scenario: Verify that the user is able to Checkin to an AdHoc Event and the Server stores the Checkin Type correctly: mlb, virtual, foursquare, mlb_sponsored + special_event = true
custom_preconds:
Prerequisite: Please test in Android 2.2, 2.3, and 4.0

Given there is Developer assistance available
And the Developer has setup an AdHoc event

NOTE:  See Mobile-QA on how to check on what has been stored on the Server for Checkins
custom_expected:
Then the user is able to Checkin successfully
And the Checkin has stored correctly on the Server
And the Checkin stored on the server has the special_event flag set to True

title: Scenario: Verify that if the device is near an MLB Sponsored location then the Foursquare location defaults to it when the user attempts to Checkin
custom_preconds:
Prerequisite: Please test in Android 2.2, 2.3,4.0 and 4.1

Given we have utilizing the QA Location Override to set our device near an MLB Sponsored Location such as the MLB FanCave
And we have selected the More menu item
And we have selected the At the Ballpark menu item
And we have selected a Stadium

URL: https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/mobile/Stadium+Longitude-Latitude+from+Google+Maps,+Estimated+2nd+Base
custom_steps: When we tap on the Checkin button
custom_expected: Then the MLB Sponsored Location will be the defaulted Foursquare location

title: Scenario: Verify that if the device is near an MLB Sponsored location and the location has defaulted as the Foursquare location that the user is able to tap on the location and select a different Foursquare location to Checkin to
custom_preconds:
Prerequisite: Please test in Android 2.2, 2.3, and 4.0

Given we have utilizing the QA Location Override to set our device near an MLB Sponsored Location such as the MLB FanCave
And we have selected the More menu item
And we have selected the At the Ballpark menu item
And we have selected a Stadium
And we have tapped on the Checkin button

URL: https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/mobile/Stadium+Longitude-Latitude+from+Google+Maps,+Estimated+2nd+Base
custom_steps: When we tap on the MLB Sponsored Location which has defaulted as the Foursquare Location
custom_expected:
Then we are able to select another Foursquare location
And we are able to Checkin successfully

title: Scenario: Verify that the user is able to successfully Checkin into an MLB Sponsored Location and that it stores on the server correctly as a type of mlb_sponsored
custom_preconds:
Prerequisite: Please test in Android 2.2, 2.3, and 4.0

Given we have utilizing the QA Location Override to set our device near an MLB Sponsored Location such as the MLB FanCave
And we have selected the More menu item
And we have selected the At the Ballpark menu item
And we have selected a Stadium

URL: https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/mobile/Stadium+Longitude-Latitude+from+Google+Maps,+Estimated+2nd+Base
NOTE:  Check with QA on how to verify that a Checkin was properly stored on the server as mlb_sponsored
custom_steps: When we tap on the Checkin button
custom_expected:
Then the user is able to Checkin successfully
And the Checkin stores itself on the server as a type of mlb_sponsored

title: Scenario: Verify that the user is able to Checkin utilizing an MLB Sponsored Location and that they can do it when the Twitter, Facebook and Foursquare switches are enabled

Prerequisite: Please test in Android 2.2, 2.3, and 4.0

Given we have utilizing the QA Location Override to set our device near an MLB Sponsored Location such as the MLB FanCave
And we have selected the More menu item
And we have selected the At the Ballpark menu item

When the user attempts to Checkin

And the user has enabled the Foursquare switch

Then the user is able to Checkin successfully
And the Checkin posts to Twitter
And the Checkin posts to Facebook
And the Checkin posts to Foursquare

title: Scenario: Verify that if the user performs a Checkin at an MLB Sponsored Location when the Twitter, Facebook and Foursquare switches are enabled that the messages on each of the sites starts as Checked in @ MLB Sponsored Location
custom_preconds:
Prerequisite: Please test in Android 2.2, 2.3, and 4.0

Given we have utilizing the QA Location Override to set our device near an MLB Sponsored Location such as the MLB FanCave
And we have selected the More menu item
And we have selected the At the Ballpark menu item
And we have selected a Stadium
custom_steps:
When the user attempts to Checkin
And the user has selected an MLB Sponsored Location as the Foursquare Location such as the MLB FanCave
And the user has enabled the Twitter switch
And the user has enabled the Facebook switch
And the user has enabled the Foursquare switch
custom_expected:
Then the user is able to Checkin successfully
And the Checkin posts to Twitter starting with Checked in @ MLB Sponsored Location Name
And the Checkin posts to Facebook starting with Checked in @ MLB Sponsored Location Name
And the Checkin posts to Foursquare starting with Checked in @ MLB Sponsored Location Name

title: Scenario: Verify if there are offers associated with an MLB Sponsored Location Checkin then that offer is unlocked when the user checks into an MLB Sponsored Location
custom_preconds:
Prerequisite: Please test in Android 2.2, 2.3, and 4.0

Given we know there is an offer associated to an MLB Sponsored Location
And we have utilized the QA Location Override to set our device near an MLB Sponsored Location such as the MLB FanCave
And we have selected the More menu item
And we have selected the At the Ballpark menu item
And we have selected a Stadium
custom_steps: When the user attempts to Checkin
custom_expected:
Then they are able to Checkin successfully
And the offer that was associated to the MLB Sponsored Location has been unlocked
